title: Lakshmi Kasula Haaram with Polki Diamonds and Coral Accents
materials: Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: This exquisite Lakshmi Kasula Haaram showcases a central pendant featuring a beautifully crafted Lakshmi figure. The pendant is intricately detailed, incorporating Nakshi work (నక్షి పని) for a temple jewelry aesthetic.  The Haaram is strung with triple strands of vibrant coral beads, punctuated by layers of dazzling Polki diamonds in a closed setting.  The pendant is framed with rubies and cascading pearl and coral beaded tassels, complemented by faceted emerald drops.  The diamond settings provide exceptional sparkle and brilliance.
occasions: and other special occasions where a grand
description: This Haaram is a masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it a unique antique charm, while the intricate Nakshi work on the Lakshmi pendant exemplifies timeless temple jewelry design. The combination of vibrant coral and dazzling diamonds creates a striking visual impact. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting rich luster. It is a valuable heirloom piece to be cherished for generations, embodying cultural significance and traditional beauty.
